com.igormaznitsa.prol.data
Class TermInteger

java.lang.Object
  com.igormaznitsa.prol.data.Term
      com.igormaznitsa.prol.data.TermInteger
All Implemented Interfaces:
NumericTerm
public final class TermInteger
extends Term
implements NumericTerm

The class describes a ground term which can save an integer value

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)
See Also:
NumericTerm

Equ

public boolean Equ(Term atom)
Description copied from class: Term
Check that the term is equal to an other term. Variables in the terms will be changed in the operation.

Overrides:
Equ in class Term
Parameters:
atom - the other term to be compared, must not be null
Returns:
true if both term are equal, else false (but terms can be changed after the operation)

public int termComparsion(Term atom)
Description copied from class: Term
To compare two terms, it is like prolog predicate '==' or '=\='

Overrides:
termComparsion in class Term
Returns:
